title: Price drop: Apply for up to 150 jobs a day with just one click
description: LazyApply saves you time by letting you apply for jobs with just a click -- hundreds of them. Get a lifetime sub now for just $59.97. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: LazyApply saves you time by letting you apply for jobs with just a click -- hundreds of them. Get a lifetime sub now for just $59.97.
text: Deals Secure your dream job quickly with this service that's proven to land job interviews. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Studies show it can take between 21 and 80 job applications to land a single offer. And that means getting your dream job can be a real numbers game. Thankfully, you can stack those numbers in your favor with smart tools like the top-rated LazyApply. It makes it easy and fast to apply for jobs. This job-search service saves you tons of time by letting you apply to hundreds of job applications with just a click. And a lifetime subscription is on sale now for just $54.40 with code SAVE20 (regular price $149). Apply for jobs the easy way with LazyApply How many hours have you wasted applying for jobs that didn’t work out? For most of us, the job application process is tedious and time-consuming. LazyApply changes that by making it a breeze to apply for jobs. The state-of-the-art service boosts your chances at landing choice employment by automating the job application process on LinkedIn and Indeed. LazyApply saves all your information, so it can apply to up to 150 roles a day for you, every single day. Let LazyApply apply for jobs, and you can spend your newfound spare time on more important things. You know, like preparing to ace the interviews you’ll get, or leveling up your skills for your resume. Automation + analytics = successful job search The other awesome thing about LazyApply is that your lifetime subscription comes with daily analytics reports. They help you analyze your job application performance so you can improve your success rate. You also can take a weekly consultation call to help you understand how well your job search is going and identify even better strategies for your job hunt. This really is your science-backed secret weapon to securing your dream job. In fact, letting this fantastic service apply for jobs for you can prove totally life-changing. Save on LazyApply automatic job applications LazyApply works as a Chrome extension, so it works on Macs and PCs. It already won a ton of fans online, with an impressive 3.8 out of 5 stars on the Chrome Web Store. Users say they love the huge number of interviews they receive as a result of LazyApply’s automatic job applications. Take the first step to getting your dream job today, with a lifetime subscription to LazyApply. It’s the easy way to apply for jobs. And, for a limited time, it’s on sale for just $54.40 with code SAVE20 (regularly $149). The discount code expires at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on July 1, 2025. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deals post on LazyApply, the easy way to apply for jobs, on March 27, 2023. We updated the pricing info.

• Deals

Studies show it can take between 21 and 80 job applications to land a single offer. And that means getting your dream job can be a real numbers game. Thankfully, you can stack those numbers in your favor with smart tools like the top-rated LazyApply. It makes it easy and fast to apply for jobs.

This job-search service saves you tons of time by letting you apply to hundreds of job applications with just a click. And a lifetime subscription is on sale now for just $54.40 with code SAVE20 (regular price $149).

Apply for jobs the easy way with LazyApply

How many hours have you wasted applying for jobs that didn’t work out? For most of us, the job application process is tedious and time-consuming. LazyApply changes that by making it a breeze to apply for jobs.

The state-of-the-art service boosts your chances at landing choice employment by automating the job application process on LinkedIn and Indeed. LazyApply saves all your information, so it can apply to up to 150 roles a day for you, every single day.

Let LazyApply apply for jobs, and you can spend your newfound spare time on more important things. You know, like preparing to ace the interviews you’ll get, or leveling up your skills for your resume.

Automation + analytics = successful job search

The other awesome thing about LazyApply is that your lifetime subscription comes with daily analytics reports. They help you analyze your job application performance so you can improve your success rate. You also can take a weekly consultation call to help you understand how well your job search is going and identify even better strategies for your job hunt.

This really is your science-backed secret weapon to securing your dream job. In fact, letting this fantastic service apply for jobs for you can prove totally life-changing.

Save on LazyApply automatic job applications

LazyApply works as a Chrome extension, so it works on Macs and PCs. It already won a ton of fans online, with an impressive 3.8 out of 5 stars on the Chrome Web Store. Users say they love the huge number of interviews they receive as a result of LazyApply’s automatic job applications.

Take the first step to getting your dream job today, with a lifetime subscription to LazyApply. It’s the easy way to apply for jobs. And, for a limited time, it’s on sale for just $54.40 with code SAVE20 (regularly $149). The discount code expires at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on July 1, 2025.
